edge: The soundtrack of Kalank is composed by Pritam Chakraborty.
The lyrics of the soundtrack of Kalank are penned by Amitabh Bhattacharya.
The song 'Ghar More Pardesiya' is a part of the soundtrack of Kalank.
The song 'First Class' is a part of the soundtrack of Kalank.
The song 'Kalank' is a part of the soundtrack of Kalank.
The song 'Tabaah Ho Gaye' is a part of the soundtrack of Kalank.
The song 'Aira Gaira' is a part of the soundtrack of Kalank.
The entire soundtrack album of Kalank was released by Zee Music Company.
